lines.text: Both position and momentum <u>cannot</u> be precisely measured simultaneously

secText:
Lesson:
1. Describe [OBJ:expsec_x482:matter waves].
2. [OBJ:expsec_x484:Compare and contrast] light interference patterns to electron interference patterns.
3. Apply the concept of matter waves to a [OBJ:pwsec_x485:transmission electron microscope].
4. Define the [OBJ:expsec_x487:Heisenberg uncertainty principle].
5. Determine the [OBJ:expsec_x486:probability] of the location of an electron in an atom.
6. [OBJ:expsec_x489:Describe] Schrödinger's thought experiment.
7. [OBJ:expsec_x489mi:Describe] the results of Schrödinger's thought experiment.
8. Calculate the [OBJ:expsec_x483:wavelength of matter].
